com.github.qacore.testingtoolbox.configuration.selenium

Class AbstractWebDriverConfiguration<I,T extends org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.qacore.testingtoolbox.configuration.AdditionalProperties<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
      • com.github.qacore.testingtoolbox.configuration.selenium.AbstractWebDriverConfiguration<I,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Itself class for fluent pattern.
    T - The driver to be configured.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChromeConfiguration, EdgeConfiguration, FirefoxConfiguration, HtmlUnitConfiguration, InternetExplorerConfiguration, OperaConfiguration, PhantomJSConfiguration, SafariConfiguration

    public abstract class AbstractWebDriverConfiguration<I,T extends org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver>
extends AdditionalProperties<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
    This class contains the abstract WebDriver configuration.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Leonardo Carmona da Silva
    • https://br.linkedin.com/in/l3ocarmona

    • lcdesenv@gmail.com

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public T start(boolean managed,
               org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities other)
        Start new WebDriver with the default merged capabilities and other capabilities.
        Parameters:
        managed - If true, will be managed by the WebDriverManager. Otherwise, false.
        other - The other capabilities. (Null is accepted)
        Returns:
        The new WebDriver with the default merged capabilities and other capabilities.

      • start

        public abstract T start(org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities other)
        Start new WebDriver with the default merged capabilities and other capabilities. This WebDriver will not be managed. If you want to manage it, please use start(boolean, Capabilities).
        Parameters:
        other - The other capabilities. (Null is accepted)
        Returns:
        The new WebDriver with the default merged capabilities and other capabilities.
        See Also:
        start(boolean, Capabilities)

      • start

        public T start(boolean managed)
        Start new WebDriver with default capabilities.
        Parameters:
        managed - If true, will be managed by the WebDriverManager. Otherwise, false.
        Returns:
        The new WebDriver with default capabilities.

      • start

        public T start()
        Start new WebDriver with default capabilities. This WebDriver will not be managed. If you want to manage it, please use start(boolean).
        Returns:
        The new WebDriver with default capabilities.
        See Also:
        start(boolean)

      • mergeCapabilities

        protected org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities mergeCapabilities(org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities other,
                                                             org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities defaultIfNull)
        Merge two Capabilities (default capabilities and other) together and return the union of the two as a new Capabilities instance. Capabilities from other will override those in this.
        Parameters:
        other - Other capabilities. (Null is accepted)
        defaultIfNull - Default capabilities if null return. (Null is accepted)
        Returns:
        The merged capabilities.

      • mergeCapabilities

        protected org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities mergeCapabilities(org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities other)
        Merge two Capabilities (default capabilities and other) together and return the union of the two as a new Capabilities instance. Capabilities from other will override those in this.
        Parameters:
        other - Other capabilities. (Null is accepted)
        Returns:
        The merged capabilities.
